document.full_text: humanitarian agencies active in pakistan's northwest have been quietly told to prepare for up to 365,000 displaced people in advance of a military offensive against north waziristan, a senior official with an international humanitarian agency said monday.
document.title: pakistan tells agencies to prepare for n.waziristan evacuation
lines_and_colors: humanitarian agencies active in pakistan's northwest have been quietly told to prepare for up to 365,000 displaced people in advance of a military offensive against north waziristan, a senior official with an international humanitarian agency said monday.
